title: SCC SkyCinema - Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

Prepare to embark on a cinematic adventure like never before as Sunset Cinema Club presents the screening of this classic at 1 mg - Lido Mall. Get ready to indulge your senses and immerse yourself in the magic of the silver screen under the open sky.

Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

Prepare to party and enjoy the evening with excellent food, live music, and cool drinks.

title: Tribute to Pink Floyd
subtitle: Ft Meduza
location: Unit G 25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall, International Tech Park, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bangalore
description:
Home, home again! You`d like to be here while you can!!!!

Hold your breath and start counting down the days before you witness the tribute night, and this time it`s to none other than Pink Floyd!
Pink Floyd was the pioneer of psychedelic music and one of the biggest selling acts ever on the planet. The group acquired a sensational reputation by performing sound & light shows and built a cult following that continues to grow even after years of the bands breaking up.

Join us for an evening full of unforgettable music, and tremendous vibes and catch Meduza playing live hits of PINK FLOYD only at the Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield, Bengaluru

title: Sing for KK: The Mega Tribute Concert
subtitle: Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert
location: 56, Commissariat Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Why This Concert is Special:
Experience the captivating and electrifying performance delivered by Alive India Rockstars
Sing along to the illustrious repertoire of KKs melodious tunes
Join us for an unforgettable night as celebrity artists unite to celebrate the timeless music of KK!
This isn't just another concert; it's the Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert, aiming to support deserving musicians through the Alive India Music Foundation NGO's MSR (Musicians Social Responsibility) Campaign, "Sing to Save - Changing Lives Through Music" mission. Our goal is to provide musicians with essentials like free food, shelter, upskill training, and sustainable career opportunities.

title: Swarathma India Tour — Powered by the Sun
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Mahadevpura
description: With the Raushan India Tour, legendary folk-rock band Swarathma (Pyaasi, Kaash, Raushan, Naane Daari, Raah E Fakira) invite you to a celebration of their new album Raushan, with music that’s fun, epic and sustainable. Known for their remarkable storytelling, Swarathma’s 20-year long journey has been marked by innovation and creativity including the live collaborations with AI, massive interactive showcases and cross-cultural music. Building on this blueprint, the iconic folk-rockers are setting out on a nationwide tour to celebrate songs from the new album as well as classic favourites, and ring in many a core memory with you. See you on the Raushan Tour, in your city!

title: Aggressive Tendencies: The Gathering
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: After 30 successful editions, Aggressive Tendencies is expanding its horizons to Bangalore, presenting one of its most monumental shows yet and unveiling an exciting new event: THE GATHERING. Prepare for the most brutal midweek gathering, showcasing the most intense lineup of the year featuring DEFEATED SANITY, GODLESS, and ANORECTAL ULCERATION. Join us for an unforgettable night of unbridled energy and unparalleled performances. Don't miss out on this epic installment of Aggressive Tendencies as we kick off a new era with The Gathering.

title: Soul Jams
subtitle: By Soul Ventures
location: Gear School Rd, Kaverappa Layout, Kadubeesanahalli
description:
Soul Jams is the ultimate destination for music lovers! Join us for an evening of relaxation, unwinding, and rejuvenation. Our welcoming space allows you to be yourself and feel at home. 
Bring your guitars, cajones, and voices to sing your heart out alongside our vibrant community in a beautiful jamming session. 

The event comprises three soul-enriching parts: 

1. Soul Open Mic: Perform for a warm and appreciative audience, regardless of where you are on your musical journey. Reach out to @souljams_live on Instagram to book your slot.
2. Social Mixers: Connect with like-minded individuals and find your tribe, fostering meaningful connections. 
3. Soul Jamming: Sing, play instruments, and join the community in a spontaneous, free-flowing musical experience. We create music together, fostering an atmosphere of refreshment and excitement.

title: Chikmagalur Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience serenity of Coffee Land
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: This paradise of misty hills and lush green tea and coffee plantations is a sweet escape from the noisy city life, resting peacefully at a height of 3,400 ft. Get ready to immerse yourself in the arms of nature! Whether you’re a thrill-seeker or a nature lover, Chikmagalur’s got you covered. Hike through the rugged terrain, or take a dip in one of the many cascading waterfalls, there’s so much to explore.

title: Coorg Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience the scotland of India
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Time to put on your adventure hat and escape to a place where relaxation and thrill collide in the most tantalizing way possible! Imagine waking up to the aroma of freshly ground coffee beans surrounded by lush greenery worthy of a postcard. Get ready to explore winding trails and stunning waterfalls, trading city life for an unforgettable adventure that will stay with you forever. Coorg's calling, are you ready

title: Wayanad Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Break the shackles of daily life and expreience adventures in God's own contry.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: The lush-green town of Wayanad in Kerala is hidden in the Malabar region on the Western Ghats. Sparsely populated, the forest-covered region abounds in picturesque hills meandered with streams, tea estates, and wildlife sanctuaries. Referred to as the ‘Spice Garden of India’, Wayanad is a hub of spices such as cardamom, star anise, fenugreek, black pepper, black cumin, etc. Adding to its treasures is Asia’s second largest and India’s largest damn, the Banasura Sagar Dam, and the Edakkal Caves from the Neolithic Age to trek to. Witness a majestic sunset at the backdrop of the dam, go hiking, mountaineering, camping, or rock climbing, you’ll never run out of fun activities at Wayanad.

title: Kodaikanal Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Get your freedom from the city noise and Experience Princess of Hill stations
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Kodaikanal, also known as the Princess of Hills in Tamil Nadu, is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India. Often considered for a romantic weekend retreat, the quaint little town is blessed with a perfect temperature at any given season. If you are seeking time alone in the lap of nature with your loved ones, Kodai is the place to go. Adorned with cascading waterfalls, shimmering lakes, and undulating green hills, the town will leave you awestruck with its natural beauty.

title: Munnar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Emrance the misty hills and relish your soul with the aroma of the tea estates.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Munnar is a popular hill station located in the state of Kerala, India. It is known for its breathtaking landscapes, tea gardens, spice plantations, and cool climate, making it a favored destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts. It is also known for its stunning landscapes, tea plantations, and pleasant weather. Munnar, with its scenic beauty, tea gardens, and tranquil ambiance, provides a perfect getaway to experience the charm of Kerala's hill stations

title: Ooty-Connoor Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience the serene Nilgiri Hills and relish the aroma of the tea estates.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Ooty and Coonoor are charming hill stations nestled in the Nilgiri Hills of Tamil Nadu, India. Here's a brief overview of each:

Also known as the "Queen of Hill Stations," Ooty is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India. It boasts pleasant weather throughout the year, with cool temperatures making it a perfect retreat from the heat of the plains. Ooty is famous for its sprawling tea gardens, lush green landscapes, and picturesque viewpoints like Doddabetta Peak, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

title: Gokarna-Murudeshwar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Enjoy the beach paradise and the endless Arabian Sea views.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: What do you visualize if we ask you about a weekend on a beach? We would not be surprised if you say Goa. And that’s precisely why we need an alternative to Goa, one which is away from the humdrum of life, one which brings peace and serenity for the weekend. This is precisely what Gokarna offers. If you are looking for a place for an escapade, to take a break after the week-long 9-5 office hours, and are tired of glancing at pictures of breathtaking beaches on your monitor, go ahead and pack your bags already.

title: Hampi Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience Karnataka's favourite UNESCO heritage site and ancient beauty.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Explore the Ancient Beauty of Hampi, Karnataka

Hampi, once the Vijayanagara Empire's capital and now a UNESCO World Heritage Site, showcases over 500 ruins and monuments. Situated on the Tungabhadra River, Hampi's intricate architecture and breathtaking scenery reflect ancient India's grandeur. The Virupaksha Temple, dedicated to the empire's patron deity, stands as its most significant structure. Beyond its historical allure, Hampi offers modern attractions with aesthetic cafes, cultural performances, and diverse cuisines in nearby Hippie Town, making it a place for fresh perspectives.

title: Pondicherry Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Live your ' Sagar Kinare, Dil Yeh Pukare' Bollywood dreams.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Pondicherry, often referred to as Puducherry, is a charming coastal town on the southeastern coast of India. Steeped in a unique blend of French and Indian influences, this Union Territory exudes a laid-back and multicultural vibe. The French Quarter, with its cobblestone streets and colonial architecture, transports you to a different era, while the bustling markets and vibrant Tamil culture showcase the town's diverse identity. With its serene beaches, like Promenade Beach and Paradise Beach, and the iconic Aurobindo Ashram, Pondicherry offers the perfect mix of relaxation and spiritual exploration. The delectable French-inspired cuisine and the colorful streets of the Auroville community further add to the town's distinctive allure. Pondicherry is a haven for those seeking a peaceful escape with a touch of cultural richness
